requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP \ Vista \ 7 \ 8 \ 10 (32 or 64bit)
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Single Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern Intel Integrated Graphics or better.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Optimized to run great on most potatoes.

  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz

  • Graphics: Must support minimum of Direct3D 9
